app.title: Google Font to SVG Path
app.description: Create SVG paths from Google Fonts with professional JKT Group branding
app.lineHeightTooltip: Multiplier for vertical spacing between lines (e.g., 1.2 = 120% of font size)
app.unionTooltip: Combine overlapping paths into a single path
app.kerningTooltip: Apply kerning adjustments for better spacing
app.separateTooltip: Place each character on a separate layer
app.bezierAccuracyTooltip: Controls curve approximation accuracy (lower = more accurate)
app.fillColorTooltip: Set fill color for SVG paths
app.strokeColorTooltip: Set stroke color for SVG paths
app.nonScalingStrokeTooltip: Keep stroke width constant regardless of zoom
app.removeFontTooltip: Remove uploaded font and revert to Google fonts
app.fontGalleryTooltip: Browse all available Google fonts with visual examples
app.createLinkTooltip: Generate shareable link with current settings

ui.googleFontTooltip: Select a Google font to use for generating the SVG path.
ui.ownFontTooltip: Upload a custom font file (e.g., .ttf, .otf) to use instead of Google fonts.
ui.variantTooltip: Select the font variant (e.g., regular, bold, italic) for the chosen Google font.
ui.textTooltip: Enter the text to convert into an SVG path using the selected font.
ui.sizeTooltip: Set the font size in pixels for the SVG output.
ui.unionTooltip: If checked, combines overlapping paths into a single path for the SVG output.
ui.kerningTooltip: If checked, applies kerning adjustments to improve spacing between characters.
ui.fillTooltip: If checked, fills the SVG paths with the specified fill color.
ui.separateCharsTooltip: If checked, each character is placed on a separate layer in the SVG output.
ui.bezierAccuracyTooltip: Controls the accuracy of Bezier curve approximation. Lower values (e.g., 0.001) are more accurate but take longer to compute. Leave blank for automatic optimization.
ui.dxfUnitsTooltip: Select the units for DXF export (e.g., mm, cm, in).
ui.fillColorTooltip: Set the fill color for the SVG paths (e.g., #ff0000 for red). Click to open color picker.
ui.strokeColorTooltip: Set the stroke color for the SVG paths (e.g., #ff0000 for red). Click to open color picker.
ui.strokeWidthTooltip: Set the width of the stroke for the SVG paths (e.g., 0.25mm).
ui.nonScalingStrokeTooltip: If checked, the stroke width remains constant regardless of zoom level in the SVG.
ui.copyToClipboardTooltip: Copy the SVG code to your clipboard.
ui.downloadSvgTooltip: Download the SVG file to your device.
ui.createLinkTooltip: Generate a shareable link with current settings.
ui.downloadDxfTooltip: Download the output as a DXF file.
ui.removeFontTooltip: Remove the uploaded custom font and revert to Google fonts.
